imdb.title: Hai-Furi
imdb.plot: Living by the sea, protecting the sea, and journeying across the sea, that is the life of the Blue Mermaid, group of women trained to operate navy warships to protect international peace and handling maritime disaster. 15 year old...

episodes.title: In a Pinch on Our Maiden Voyage!
episodes.plot: Join Akeno on her journey as she takes her first Maiden Voyage out to sea. She must graduate her high school so she can become part of the esteemed Blue Mermaids!

episodes.title: In a Pinch During the Pursuit!
episodes.plot: Akeno's ship, the Harekaze has mutinied?! Find out what happens as the group of girls enjoy their first meal together and welcome their first unexpected guest!

episodes.title: In a Pinch in Pajamas!
episodes.plot: Moka's ship is in trouble! Will Akeno be able to save her? What about this new beautiful blonde girl? Find out what happens as Akeno and her crew find a new friend in the most unlikely of places!

episodes.title: Maidens in a Pinch!
episodes.plot: With a new friend on board, what kind of cute adventures could they have all together? Watch as the girls' face one of their toughest problem yet!

episodes.title: Pinched by the Musashi!
episodes.plot: Finally, the Harekaze is free from the cloud of mutiny. We all know what that means, right? Time for some fun in the sun! Tune in as Akeno and the Harekaze watch a fantastic firework show!

episodes.title: In a Mined Pinch!
episodes.plot: Will Akeno be able to save her beloved friend? Tune in this week as we go on a German Food Tour, and eat all the food! After all, what's mine is mine, right?

episodes.title: In a Stormy Pinch!
episodes.plot: Akeno's family grows by the week! Who could they run in to this week? Tune in as we meet the new, cutest family member ever!

episodes.title: In a Pinch with the Hiei!
episodes.plot: It's time to find out about that big looming, scary ship! Who could that be? How should we welcome them this week? Find out as Akeno and her crew cook up some new ideas!

episodes.title: Mina in a Pinch!
episodes.plot: Sisters at sea, Akeno's family grows by the episode! Tune in this week as we welcome even more family members in pink!

episodes.title: Happy at the Equator Festival!
episodes.plot: Don't worry Coco, it'll be okay! Tune in as we find out what the Harekaze crew members will do during two days of repair time!

episodes.title: In a Pinch with a Battleship's Big Cannon!
episodes.plot: Blue Mermaids to the rescue! Can the Harekaze keep up? Tune in this week as Operation: Perseus is a go!

episodes.title: In a Pinch with the Last Battle!
episodes.plot: Are you guys ready for the final fireworks show?! Grab your big shark plushie, and tune in as we join Akeno and her crew in this booming finale!
